title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, Chat and Embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) with multi-model chat, file uploads, RAG, user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; synchronous & async APIs, model management, streaming chat.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB to chat with local documents.

title: chatbox-ai
summary: Cross-platform desktop client (Electron) supporting Ollama, OpenAI, Claude; markdown, prompts, folders.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension using Ollama for local code completion and chat.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, and completion.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook: Python & JS snippets, LangChain, LlamaIndex, RAG, function-calling examples.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with async options and RxJS streams.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate exposing typed async client for Ollama’s chat, generate and embedding endpoints.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with chat, generate, embeddings and model management; supports streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot bringing Ollama models to servers via slash commands and thread-based chats.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds Ollama-powered AI commands for summarization, translation, continuation.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot using Bolt JS to chat with Ollama models, supports threads and app mentions.

title: ollama-rag-llamaindex
summary: LlamaIndex LLM & embedding integrations for Ollama enabling advanced RAG pipelines.
